SEARCH
Package org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.utils.result

Class AsyncAttemptsAggregate<T,F extends FailureReason>

java.lang.Object
org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.utils.result.AsyncAttemptsAggregate<T,F>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the successful result.
F - The type representing failure reasons.
public final class AsyncAttemptsAggregate<T,F extends FailureReason> extends Object
An asynchronous wrapper for AttemptsAggregate. This class aggregates a list of AsyncAttempt objects, ensuring all futures are completed before converting them into a synchronous AttemptsAggregate.
